meanings.definition: A tube-shaped pastry shell filled with sweetened ricotta cheese and often containing nuts, chocolate chips, or candied fruit.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious cannoli for dessert last night.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells the best cannoli in town.
meanings.sent3: When the cannoli started dancing, everyone at the party laughed.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a cannoli on a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked cannoli filled the kitchen.
